txt.en: 'Are you interesting in assisting with the work on the farm today? Some of the fields are ready for sowing! It can be so rewarding, seeing your work grow into delicious food! Do you agree?'
When neighbours work together, the households of the Rohan Kingstead will glisten upon the rolling plains.
Turned soil can be found throughout the neighbourhoods of the Rohan Kingstead.\n\nYou should plant seeds.
